resources.string: On the basis of your responses to the alcohol questions, we have no concerns about your drinking. If you have concerns about drinking, smoking, drug use, exercise, or sleep, please discuss them with your doctor at you next visit.\nHave a good day.

Your responses to the alcohol questions suggest that you are at increased risk of having alcohol problems, either now or in the future.\n We recommend that you make an appointment with your doctor, who can further evaluate your level of risk.\n Meanwhile, we recommend using this app to get further assessment and feedback on your health.
